sentence: Preparing a home-cooked meal from scratch can be ______ but rewarding.
sentence_translation: 从头准备一顿家常菜可能很耗时，但很有意义。

sentence: She ______ ______ ______ her final exams and has no time for parties.
sentence_translation: 她忙于期末考试，没时间参加派对。

sentence: All athletes must pass ______ ______ ______ before joining the team.
sentence_translation: 所有运动员加入团队前必须通过健身测试。

sentence: Regular reading can ______ students ______ in many subjects.
sentence_translation: 定期阅读能让学生在多个学科上在学业上受益。

sentence: Students who get enough sleep tend to ______ ______ in class.
sentence_translation: 睡眠充足的学生在课堂上往往表现得更好。

sentence: He ______ ______ ______ jazz music and collects many albums.
sentence_translation: 他是爵士乐的粉丝，收藏了很多专辑。

sentence: Buying expensive clothes you never wear is ______ ______ ______.
sentence_translation: 买昂贵却从不穿的衣服是浪费钱。

sentence: The company plans to ______ ______ new technology to improve efficiency.
sentence_translation: 公司计划投资于新技术以提高效率。

sentence: The restaurant needs to ______ ______ ______ during peak seasons.
sentence_translation: 这家餐厅在旺季需要雇用额外的员工。

sentence: The school allocates funds to ______ ______ ______ every year.
sentence_translation: 学校每年拨款维护体育设施。

sentence: Unfair criticism can ______ ______ ______ among team members.
sentence_translation: 不公平的批评会在团队成员中产生负面情绪。

sentence: Young people ______ ______ ______ pursue their dreams by his success story.
sentence_translation: 年轻人被他的成功故事激励去追求梦想。

sentence: Too much noise in the library can ______ ______ ______ ______.
sentence_translation: 图书馆里噪音太大能影响我的学习效率。

sentence: Doctors often face ______ ______ ______ during flu season.
sentence_translation: 流感季节，医生经常面临要求很高的工作量。

sentence: Playing video games for hours every day may ______ ______ ______.
sentence_translation: 每天玩几小时电子游戏可能影响我的成绩。

sentence: Her parents decided to ______ ______ ______ to help her with physics.
sentence_translation: 她的父母决定雇请家教帮她补习物理。

sentence: Volunteering for ______ ______ is a good way to give back to society.
sentence_translation: 参与社区服务是回馈社会的好方式。

sentence: Employees are ______ ______ ______ ______ to meet the project deadline.
sentence_translation: 为了赶上项目截止日期，员工们承受很大压力。

sentence: With ______ ______ ______, she has to balance work and study carefully.
sentence_translation: 时间安排紧张，她必须小心平衡工作和学习。

sentence: Taking ______ ______ is cheaper than driving a car in the city.
sentence_translation: 在城市里乘坐公共交通比开车便宜。

sentence: Students are encouraged to ______ ______ sports and cultural activities.
sentence_translation: 鼓励学生参与体育和文化活动。

sentence: All visitors ______ ______ ______ ______ wear ID badges in the building.
sentence_translation: 所有访客被要求在大楼内佩戴身份徽章。

sentence: The trip lasted two days longer ______ ______ due to bad weather.
sentence_translation: 由于天气不好，这次旅行比预期的久了两天。

sentence: You can exchange this ______ for a free meal at the cafeteria.
sentence_translation: 你可以用这个代币在食堂换一顿免费的饭。

sentence: We need a pair of ______ to play this board game.
sentence_translation: 我们需要一对骰子来玩这个桌面游戏。

sentence: It's rude to ______ at people with curiosity in public places.
sentence_translation: 在公共场所好奇地凝视别人是不礼貌的。

sentence: Family gatherings help ______ relatives closer together.
sentence_translation: 家庭聚会有助于亲戚之间增进感情。

sentence: Working in a ______ environment requires good time management.
sentence_translation: 在快节奏的环境中工作需要良好的时间管理能力。

sentence: She shared a travel ______ with beautiful photos on her blog.
sentence_translation: 她在博客上分享了一篇带漂亮照片的旅行帖子。

sentence: The ______ music in the café made it hard to focus on reading.
sentence_translation: 咖啡馆里分散注意力的音乐让人难以专注阅读。

sentence: He used a ______ ______ to take photos in the dark room.
sentence_translation: 他用闪光灯在暗室里拍照。

sentence: Please don't ______ your sister while she's doing homework.
sentence_translation: 你妹妹做作业时请不要打扰她。

sentence: The museum exhibits ______ from ancient civilizations around the world.
sentence_translation: 这家博物馆展出了来自世界各地古代文明的艺术品。

sentence: We should ______ the efforts teachers make for our education.
sentence_translation: 我们应该欣赏老师为我们的教育所做的努力。

sentence: The new ______ of impressionist paintings will open next week.
sentence_translation: 新的印象派绘画展览将于下周开幕。

sentence: Readers can ______ themselves in the magical world of the novel.
sentence_translation: 读者可以沉浸在小说的魔幻世界中。

sentence: The ______ talk show made the audience laugh throughout the program.
sentence_translation: 这个有趣的脱口秀让观众在整个节目过程中都笑个不停。

sentence: The ______ instructions made it hard to assemble the furniture.
sentence_translation: 复杂的说明让人难以组装家具。

sentence: His throat felt ______ after speaking for hours at the meeting.
sentence_translation: 在会议上讲话几小时后，他的喉咙感到疼痛。

sentence: Watching a light ______ is a good way to relax after a busy day.
sentence_translation: 忙碌一天后，看一部轻松的喜剧是放松的好方法。

sentence: Playing ______ ______ for too long can harm your eyesight.
sentence_translation: 玩太久电子游戏会损害视力。

sentence: We often play ______ ______ like monopoly with family on weekends.
sentence_translation: 我们周末经常和家人玩大富翁之类的桌面游戏。

sentence: They met at a popular ______ ______ ______ to try new games.
sentence_translation: 他们在一家受欢迎的桌游店见面尝试新游戏。

sentence: This game's ______ ______ allows players from different countries to compete.
sentence_translation: 这款游戏的在线模式允许来自不同国家的玩家竞技。

sentence: She needs to ______ ______ on her studies after missing a week of school.
sentence_translation: 缺课一周后，她需要赶上学习进度。

sentence: The store sells various ______ ______ such as smartphones and tablets.
sentence_translation: 这家店出售各种电子产品，如智能手机和平板电脑。

sentence: It's important to ______ ______ one task at a time to do it well.
sentence_translation: 一次专注于一项任务才能把它做好，这很重要。

sentence: Watching a ______ ______ ______ helps reduce stress after work.
sentence_translation: 下班后看一部轻松的喜剧有助于缓解压力。

sentence: The funny scene in the movie made the whole audience ______ ______ ______ ______.
sentence_translation: 电影里的搞笑场景让全场观众捧腹大笑。

english: go through a lot of trouble
sentence: They ______ ______ ______ ______ ______ to help the lost child find his parents.
sentence_translation: 他们费很大劲帮助那个迷路的孩子找到父母。

sentence: Bright colors and creative designs help advertisements ______ ______ easily.
sentence_translation: 鲜艳的颜色和有创意的设计帮助广告轻松获得关注。

sentence: The professor's lecture was so abstract that it was ______ ______ ______ for beginners.
sentence_translation: 这位教授的讲座太抽象，初学者难以理解。
